Add loo if not already present

Source: R/mcpfit_methods.R
with_loo.Rd

Add loo if not already present

with_loo(fit, save_psis = FALSE, info = NULL)

Arguments

fit

An mcpfit object
save_psis

Logical. See documentation of loo::loo
info

Optional message if adding loo

Value

An mcpfit object with loo.
